channel.title: Upcoming OECD Publication Embargoes and Launches
channel.description: A list of dates and publications

item.title: Skills on the Move - Migrants in the Survey of Adult Skills
item.description: Skills on the Move - Migrants in the Survey of Adult Skills by Directorate for Education and Skills has an embargo on Monday, 29 October 2018, 11:00 Paris time (GMT+01:00).

item.title: The evolution of gender gaps in numeracy and literacy between childhood and adulthood
item.description: The evolution of gender gaps in numeracy and literacy between childhood and adulthood by Directorate for Education and Skills has an embargo on Tuesday, 30 October 2018, 11:00 Paris time (GMT+01:00).

item.title: Revenue Statistics in Africa 2018, Statistiques des recettes publiques en Afrique 2018
item.description: Revenue Statistics in Africa 2018, Statistiques des recettes publiques en Afrique 2018 by Development Centre, Centre for Tax Policy and Administration has an embargo on Wednesday, 31 October 2018, 10:00 Paris time (GMT+01:00).
item.oe:directorate: Development Centre, Centre for Tax Policy and Administration

item.title: Examen multidimensionnel du Sénégal - Volume 3. De l'analyse à l'action
item.description: Examen multidimensionnel du Sénégal - Volume 3. De l'analyse à l'action by Public Affairs and Communications Directorate, Development Centre has an embargo on Monday, 5 November 2018, 11:00 Paris time (GMT+01:00).
item.oe:directorate: Public Affairs and Communications Directorate, Development Centre

item.title: Revenue Statistics in Asian and Pacific Economies
item.description: Revenue Statistics in Asian and Pacific Economies by Development Centre, Centre for Tax Policy and Administration has an embargo on Thursday, 29 November 2018, 11:00 Paris time (GMT+01:00).
item.oe:directorate: Development Centre, Centre for Tax Policy and Administration

item.title: SME and Entrepreneurship Policy in Kazakhstan 2018
item.description: SME and Entrepreneurship Policy in Kazakhstan 2018 by Centre for Entrepreneurship, SMEs and Local Development has an embargo on Wednesday, 5 December 2018, 0:01 Paris time (GMT+01:00).
item.oe:directorate: Centre for Entrepreneurship, SMEs and Local Development
